tool_description:
Magic the Gathering card, set and Dutch price information.
Each api call is required to provide a authentication key.
You can request one by email, it's free by the way
info@cardsearch.nl

Each api call can provide an additional parameter "format" with values "json","xml", "csv" or "table".
Json is the default format.
Example GET http://api.cardsearch.nl/v1/sets?key=demo&format=xml
name: Cardsearch
title: Cardsearch

api_list.name: /v1/prices
api_list.description: Get general price information per card

optional_parameters.name: mids[]
optional_parameters.description: A single card or multiple cards by multiverseid
